Package com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zabzabdoda.pgl.component.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Label, Panel, RadioController
    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a graphical widget that can be drawn on the screen. Classes such as button and label extend this class
    Author:
    zabzabdoda

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Component​(int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Creates an instance of a Component which has elements that are necessary to be drawn on the screen

        width - The width of the component
        height - The height of the component
